display.title: Other Details
display.body: LED-backlit display with IPS technology 2304x1440 resolution at 226 pixels per inch with support for millions of colours

connectivity.title: Wireless
connectivity.body: Wi-Fi : 802.11ac Wi-Fi wireless networking | IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n compatible

physical_specs.title: Ports
physical_specs.body: USB-C port with support for:- Charging, USB 3.1 Gen 1 (up to 5 Gbps), Native DisplayPort 1.2 video output

processor.title: Processor Details
processor.body: Turbo Boost up to 3.2GHz, with 4MB L3 cache

processor.title: GPU
processor.body: Intel HD Graphics 615 | Dual display and video mirroring: simultaneously supports full native resolution on the built-in display and up to 4096x2304 resolution at 60Hz on an external display, both at millions of colours

power.title: Battery and Power
power.body: Up to 10 hours wireless web | Up to 12 hours iTunes movie playback | Up to 30 days of standby time

power.title: Charging Adapter
power.body: 30W USB-C Power Adapter; USB-C power port

keyboard.title: Keyboard
keyboard.body: Full-sized keyboard with:- 78 (US) or 79 (ISO) individual LED-backlit keys, including 12 function keys and 4 arrow keys | Ambient light sensor

keyboard.title: Touchpad
keyboard.body: Force Touch trackpad for precise cursor control and pressure-sensing capabilities; enables Force clicks, accelerators, pressure-sensitive drawing and Multi-Touch gestures

pre_installed_apps.title: Built-in Apps
pre_installed_apps.body: Photos, iMovie, GarageBand, Mail, Safari, Siri and more
